amendment.description: To promote job creation and small business preservation in the adjustment of the Federal minimum wage.

action.text: Amendment SA 4376 proposed by Senator Enzi.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4376 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 53. Record Vote Number: 180.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 4376, pursuant to the order of June 20, 2006, withdrawn in Senate.

reference.ref: printed in Senate Legislative Calendar of June 21, 2006 [pdf]
